categories.label: Medical Misinformation / Health Claims
categories.guidance: Avoid implying diagnosis, cure, or prevention. Prefer neutral wellness phrasing.

categories.label: Harmful or Dangerous Acts
categories.guidance: No encouragement of dangerous activities, challenges, or bypassing safety.

categories.label: Minors' Safety
categories.guidance: No unsafe challenges for kids or targeting minors with age-inappropriate content.

categories.label: Hate / Harassment
categories.guidance: Avoid slurs, dehumanizing language, harassment, or doxxing.

categories.label: Scams / Financial Misrepresentation
categories.guidance: No off-platform payments, crypto giveaways, or investment claims.

categories.label: Clickbait / Spam

rewrite.find: click here|get rich quick|act now|once in a lifetime|you won't believe|shocking|guaranteed results|instant results

categories.guidance: Keep titles/captions clear and accurate; avoid manipulative phrasing.

hints.title: State the idea clearly without hype.
hints.caption: Provide helpful context, disclaimers when needed, and honest outcomes.
hints.hashtags: Use relevant tags; avoid spammy/irrelevant stuffing.
